title: Guardian Angel: Never a bad option
body:
As cool as it is that there's a non-boots item everybody on your team can build, GA is essentially too good to not buy. Who can't make use of it? Nobody. Who doesn't want it in their build? Only people making FULL DAMAGE HYPE69 YOUTUBE videos.

I don't even know how to fix this. The stats are good (if not cost efficient) before you apply the passive. And we can't just jack up the price because then it becomes an anti-throw item.
